ingredients.item: 350g from a 600g tub Waitrose Duchy Organic Tomato & Thyme Soup
400g can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil and fry the chicken, carrot and leek for 5 minutes. Add the soup and cannellini beans, cover and cook for 5 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked throughout with no pink meat.
Stir in the parsley and serve immediately.
